title: Barber: Scenes and Arias - Roberta Alexander (1993)

Stereo Review:
"Roberta Alexander's outstanding CD of vocal music by Samuel Barber demonstrates the soprano's understanding of the composer's musical language and emotional content â€¦ The Netherlands Radio Philharmonic plays very well under the tasteful leadership of Edo de Waart."
